mongo.title: Developing for the MEAN Stack and MongoDB
mongo.description: MongoDB is an open-source document database, and leading NoSQL database. MongoDB is written in c++. This tutorial will give you great understanding on MongoDB concepts needed to create and deploy a highly scalable and performance oriented database.

mongo.title: Foundations Programming Databases - MongoDB
mongo.description: Accelerate your learning with in-person training taught by MongoDB engineers. These immersive classes offer hands-on experience with MongoDB use cases based on years of field experience. Developer and DBA classes offered around the globe. We offer 2-day and 3-day classes.

mongo.title: Article - MySQL vs MongoDB
mongo.description: MongoDB is an open-source document database, and leading NoSQL database. MongoDB is written in c++. This tutorial will give you great understanding on MongoDB concepts needed to create and deploy a highly scalable and performance oriented database.
